backend/main.mo: Defines types for user profiles, testimonies, scripture content, feed items, comments, Bible data, and initializes in‑memory maps for all backend state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records referencing changes to AuthGate, including hero‑image removal and related code cleanup.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color variables, dark mode values, and global styles for background, text, and borders.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting icons, metadata, root mount node, and loading the main application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router, theme, query client, layouts, and all evangelism and feed routes for the application.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Landing page with headline, subheadline, login CTA, faith‑resources link, and a three‑feature overview section.
frontend/src/components/bible/BibleReade: Empty placeholder file for future Bible reader component.
frontend/src/components/bible/BibleSideb: Empty placeholder file for future Bible sidebar component.
Empty placeholder file for Bible sidebar context provider.
frontend/src/components/bible/ReferenceS: Empty placeholder file for a Scripture reference search component.
frontend/src/components/evangelism/Evang: CTA card prompting sign‑in or navigation to onboarding or feed based on authentication and profile state.
Layout shell for evangelism pages with optional hero image, title, subtitle, and content container.
frontend/src/components/feed/AddCommentF: Form for submitting comments or prayer requests with optional scripture references and async submission handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/AgentReplyC: Displays an AI agent's reply with content, references, verification badge, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/feed/AuthorIdent: Shows either a system agent badge or a community member name based on the author's principal.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Dialog showing a scrollable thread of comments plus a form to add new comments.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostC: Card-based composer for creating new posts with content and optional scripture references.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItemCar: Renders feed items for scripture, discernment reflections, or testimonies with navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/FollowButto: Button to follow or unfollow a user with loading states and identity checks.
frontend/src/components/feed/ReactionBar: Provides a like button with count and toggling between add and remove reaction states.
frontend/src/components/feed/RepostButto: Button to repost an item to the user’s feed with loading and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/UnifiedFeed: Renders a unified feed card showing post type, author, date, and actions like follow, reactions, and reposting.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Implements the top navigation bar with evangelism links, resource links, support button, and authentication actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with the app header, main content container, and footer including a branded link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SupportWi: Provides a dialog button for copying an ICP address to support the project financially.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Exports brand asset paths and the application’s brand name.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines centralized React Query cache keys for user, feed, and Bible data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Fetches and saves the user’s last-read Bible location using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBibleQueries.ts: Provides hooks to fetch Bible translations, books, chapters, verses, and search results via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvangelismScrollTo: Scrolls to the top when navigating to designated evangelism-related routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, initializes AuthClient, and exposes identity, login, and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, feed data, posts, reactions, and comments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, typography, and utility classes for the app’s dark-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssuranceNextStepsPag: Renders the Assurance & Next Steps evangelism page with structured sections, scripture badges, navigation links, and a CTA card.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Displays the Connect evangelism page with teaching sections, scripture references, navigation links, and a CTA card.
frontend/src/pages/DailyFeedPage.tsx: Shows the community feed with post creation, unified social feed, and interleaved daily scripture, reflections, and testimonies.
frontend/src/pages/DiscernmentDetailPage: Displays details for a selected discernment reflection, including content, scripture references, labels, and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/evangelism/topics-que: Generic layout wrapper for individual topic pages rendering sections, references, and a CTA card.
Loads and renders the 'how to read the Bible' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'how to share your faith' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what happens after death' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is baptism' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is faith' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is prayer' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is repentance' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is salvation' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is sin' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is the church' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'what is the gospel' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'who is God' topic using TopicPageShell.
Loads and renders the 'why did Jesus die' topic using TopicPageShell.
frontend/src/pages/evangelismContent.ts: Defines structured evangelism content with topics, sections, and Scripture references for Gospel teaching pages.
frontend/src/pages/FaithResourcesPage.ts: Renders a resource hub with categorized faith content and navigation links for beginners and growing believers.
frontend/src/pages/HowToBeginPage.tsx: Displays step‑by‑step guidance for beginning a relationship with Jesus, using structured content, references, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 error page with options to return home or go back.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Provides a form to collect user profile details and saves them before navigating to the feed.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodPage.tsx: Presents Gospel-focused sections with references, follow‑up topics, and links to related evangelism pages.
frontend/src/pages/peaceWithGodStepsCont: Provides step-by-step Gospel presentation content and supporting interfaces, including outlines, detailed text, and Scripture passages.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsIntr: Introduces a four‑step journey toward peace with God and links to the full steps page with supportive context.
frontend/src/pages/PeaceWithGodStepsLong: Renders a long multi-step evangelism page with step content, scriptures, response steps, and a prayer section.
frontend/src/pages/ScriptureDetailPage.t: Displays a detailed view of a single scripture from the daily feed with text, reflection, and labels.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitTestimonyPage.t: Provides a form to submit a testimony with scripture references and shows a confirmation view after submission.
frontend/src/pages/topicsQuestionsConten: Contains question-based theological topic content with sections, references, and a Church Origins framing.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsQuestionsIndexP: Lists all Topics & Questions articles with links, descriptions, and a call-to-action card.
frontend/src/pages/WhyJesusPage.tsx: Shows an evangelism page explaining why Jesus matters, with sections, scripture references, and navigation links.
frontend/src/utils/bibleReference.ts: Implements utilities for validating and parsing Bible references, including book and chapter lookup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theming, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores high-level project metadata, feature states, and request tracking for the hero image removal project.
